articles.description: Co-organiser Emily Eavis blamed the increase on the ‘enormous rises in the costs of running this vast show’ and the continuing fallout from the pandemic
articles.content:
The cost of Glastonbury tickets has risen from £265 plus a £5 booking fee in 2019 the last time tickets went on sale to £335 plus £5 booking fee for the 2023 edition of the festival.
